interface.name: org.alljoyn.SmartSpaces.Operation.CyclicControl
interface.description: This interface provides capability to monitor the operational state of an appliance and to control it using relate commands

property.name: OperationalState
property.description: Current operational state of the appliance

property.name: SupportedOperationalStates
property.description: Operational states which are supported by the appliance

property.name: SupportedOperationalCommands
property.description: Operational commands which are supported by the appliance

signal.name: EndOfCycle
signal.description: Emitted this signal if the cycle is completed
